home.title: Real time dashboard and analytics
home.description: F1 Telemetry is a fan-made Formula 1 dashboard, it includes a configurable map and data for race analysis. In addition, you can listen to the team radios in real time, which are transcribed and translated with AI
home.audioDesc1: You can hear instantly the team radio message of every driver during race, we also
home.audioDesc2: use AI for translation and transcription!
home.circlesDesc1: We are constantly adding features to improve race analysis, like the
home.circlesDesc3: which is great to take undercut decisions!
home.goalDesc1: Our goal is to attempt and display all analytics and data possible, giving you the best experience at watching the race. This is only possible with your very important feedback and ideas, so please
home.goalDesc2: reach us on our discord server!
home.repoDesc1: If you have any features ideas or critics you are happily invited to contribute on this
home.repoDesc3: This project will always be free and open source.

footer.legal: This website is not associated, affiliated, authorized, endorsed, or officially connected in any way with Formula 1, the FIA, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.
